aboutcomponent.title: Overview
aboutcomponent.about: I'm a skilled software developer with experience in TypeScript and JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React, Node.js, and Three.js. I'm a quick learner and collaborate closely with clients to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

expirience.sub: What I have done so far
expirience.title: Work Experience.

points.text1: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and other related technologies.
points.text2: Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
points.text3: Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.

points.text1: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and other related technologies.
points.text2: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products.
points.text3: Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
points.text4: Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.

workcomponent.title: Projects.
workcomponent.body: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

card1.name: Boom Shop
card1.description: A web application that allows you to create, delete, and modify posts. In the application, you can leave your comments on the posts.

card2.name: CRM
card2.description: A web platform that enables you to create and manage computer courses in the admin panel.

card3.name: Hyper Studio
card3.description: A web application that allows you to create, delete, and modify posts. In the application, you can leave your comments on the posts. You can also communicate with other users in personal or global chat.

card1.testimonial: I thought it was impossible to make a website as beautiful as our product, but Rick proved me wrong.
card1.name: Sara Lee

card2.testimonial: I've never met a web developer who truly cares about their clients' success like Rick does.
card2.name: Chris Brown

card3.testimonial: After Rick optimized our website, our traffic increased by 50%. We can't thank them enough!
card3.name: Lisa Wang

contactcomponent.title: Contact.
contactcomponent.info: Thank you. I will get back to you as soon as possible
